      • getLoan

        public Loan getLoan(Bank bank,
                    int accountNumber,
                    java.lang.String password,
                    long loanAmount)
        Description copied from interface: ICustomerService
        Will create a new loan for the given account number granted the customer's credit line is low enough. Note: the customer credit line is verified against all banks. By default, when a new account is created, total amount for the loans should not exceed 1.500$.
        Specified by:
        getLoan in interface ICustomerService
        loanAmount - requested loan amount
        Returns:
